mapper.select: SELECT top 1 cardKey ,CardNo ,WebID ,Lang_cd ,StoreCode ,CustLanguage ,Sex ,EnName ,Phone ,Address ,city_cd ,City ,province_cd ,Province ,country_cd ,PostalCode ,EMail ,KrName ,CardIssueDate ,LastModDate FROM tblCustomer WHERE EnName = #{enName} or KrName = #{krName} AND Phone = #{phone} ORDER BY LastTranDate DESC
